name: React E-Commerce Store
description: Production quality e-commerce app with React, Redux-Saga, Hooks, Stripe, MUI, Firebase, SASS, styled-components, Serverless functions & complex state management

name: Learn SDLC
description: An interactive online learning platform to learn Systems Development Life Cycle. Implements a strategic learning progression, with knowledge presentation followed by a quick quick for active recall

name: Fillactive Fitspirit
description: Project made as part of a team during a hackathon organized by Morgan Stanley, for a non-profit - Fillactive, to reache out and encourage teenage girls to change their mindset about physical activity

name: ExpiRem (REST) API
description: Demonstration of a simple yet powerful REST API to create intuitive and performant applications which users can use to manage expiration of products or items
